key_risks: Legal and regulatory challenges including class action lawsuits and federal investigations
Franchisee profitability concerns and market saturation
Dependence on in-person classes making the company vulnerable to disruptions
Leadership and operational concerns including CEO suspension and high turnover
controversies: Class action lawsuit alleging misrepresentations or omissions related to financial health and franchisee performance
Federal investigations by the U.S. Attorney’s Office and FBI criminal probe
Multiple labor-related lawsuits including Fair Labor Standards Act violations
social_issues: Labor disputes and allegations of unfair practices, including violations of the California Labor Code
governance_issues: CEO suspension and leadership changes raising concerns about governance and operational stability
High turnover in the franchise sales team
